articles.description: That time the U.S. government accidentally created a cheese surplus so large it had to be stored in a ginormous cave. | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
articles.title: Big Government Cheese (CLASSIC)

articles.description: Two stories from our Indicator team about the sometimes-unlikely people who shape what we buy and what we do. | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
articles.title: Get The Vaccine, Lose The Skinny Jeans

articles.description: The United States is one of the few countries that lets companies pay people for their blood plasma. Why? | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
articles.title: Blood Money

articles.description: A janitor walks out of a chip factory with a bag of dustless Cheetos and changes the global snack game forever. | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
articles.title: Hot Cheetos

articles.description: Carbon offsets have become a popular tool to combat climate change. But how effective are they? | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
articles.title: Emission Impossible

articles.description: Some Vermonters were tired of waiting around for reparations. So they decided to take matters into their own hands. | This episode was produced with our friends at Invisibilia. Check out their new season here.
articles.title: DIY Reparations

articles.description: In the last and greatest chapter to our superhero saga, Micro-Face tries to make the jump from comic books to movies. | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
articles.title: A Superhero Goes To Hollywood

articles.description: Why is a single New Jersey deli worth so much? And what does it tell us about how the stock market works? | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
articles.title: The $100 Million Deli

articles.author: ShopTalk
articles.description: Jason Lengstorf and Phil Hawksworth chat about the current state of the Jamstack including React + Jamstack, Distributed Persistent Rendering, building for ease of use, dealing with minor changes and caching, whether Jamstack needs to do all things, and a big new Netlify features announced!
articles.title: 464: Jamstack & New Netlify Features with Jason Lengstorf & Phil Hawksworth

articles.author: ShopTalk
articles.description: Camera and gear for your desk talk, and answering your questions about build tools, programatically creating social media images, border radius clipping of parents, debugging Safari on Windows, the state of Drupal in 2021, and using code blocks in WordPress.
articles.title: 463: Choose Build Tools, Social Media Images, Border Radius Clipping, and Debugging Safari in Windows

articles.author: ShopTalk
articles.description: Dave and Chris talked at An Event Apart Spring Summit 2021 on the good and bad of the web. They talked about CSS, framework knowledge, more CSS, PWA's for projects, service workers, the language of tooling, and web performance.
articles.title: 462: ShopTalk Show Live at AEA – The Web is Good, the Web is Bad

articles.author: ShopTalk
articles.description: Dave's base got camped and Chris tried to improve the WordPress audio player. Also discussed: shared element transitions, Turbo, Astro, typography and fonts, and just simply blogging.
articles.title: 461: Dave Fired Everyone, WordPress Audio Player, Shared Element Transitions, and Fonts!
